sense.gloss: to turn toward, to look (up, down, etc.)
to face (e.g. east) (of a building, window, etc.), to look out on, to front (on)
to point (of an arrow, compass needle, etc.)
to be suited to, to be fit for
to go towards, to turn to (of one's interests, feelings, etc.), to be inclined (to do)

sdata.j: ジェイソンは↑無口↑↓|むく|ち↓な↑人↑↓ひと↓だったので↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑何↑↓なに↓かを↑言↑↓い↓うたび↑驚↑↓おどろ↓いていた。
sdata.e: Jason was a taciturn individual, so it was always a real surprise when he said anything.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑努力↑↓どりょく↓はいずれ↑報↑↓|むく|↓われるだろう。
sdata.e: Your effort will be rewarded in the long run.

sdata.j: ↑近↑↓ちか↓いうちに↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑当然↑↓とうぜん↓の↑報↑↓|むく|↓いを↑受↑↓う↓けることになります。
sdata.e: One of these fine days he will get his just deserts.

sdata.j: ちょっと↑寒↑↓さ|む↓く|ないですか？
↑寒↑↓さ|む↓く|↑感↑↓かん↓じます。↑窓↑↓まど↓を↑閉↑↓し↓めてもいいですか。
sdata.e: I feel cold. Do you mind closing the window?

sdata.j: ↑寒↑↓さ|む↓く|なるにつれて、セーターがほしくなった。
sdata.e: As the day got cooler, I had to put on a sweater.
